<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Aim](/Feats.aspx?ID=391) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 149 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

By spending a moment to focus, you can ensure your attack strikes true. Make a ranged weapon Strike. On this Strike, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore the target's [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition.

<title level="2">Incredible Aim leads to...</title>
[Incredible Ricochet](/Feats.aspx?ID=410)
name: Incredible Aim
